function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in construction sites","Impact":"Increased risk of outbreaks among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, provide PPE, and enforce social distancing on construction sites","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and virtual inspections","People":"Construction workers, site managers, inspectors","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Supply chain issues causing delays in obtaining necessary materials","Impact":"Delays in construction projects, leading to potential cost overruns","Mitigation":"Diversify suppliers, stockpile critical materials, and use technology for real-time supply chain tracking","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, IoT sensors for tracking inventory, predictive analytics for demand forecasting","People":"Procurement managers, supply chain managers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, procurement managers"},{"Description":"Operational restrictions impacting workforce productivity","Impact":"Decreased productivity and efficiency, leading to project delays and increased costs","Mitigation":"Implement remote work solutions, staggered work schedules, and enhance communication and collaboration tools","Technologies":"Project management software, video conferencing tools, cloud-based collaboration platforms","People":"Project managers, construction supervisors, workforce","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, HR managers"}]}
